headline: What Oracle Has to Lose From OpenAI and Nvidia’s Rocky Relationship
summary: OpenAI’s relationship with Nvidia has epitomized concerns about circularity in artificial-intelligence deals.  The companies’ letter of intent, unveiled Sept. 22, called for Nvidia to invest as much as $100 billion in OpenAI over many years.  While some of the money would flow back to Nvidia for its chips, some would help OpenAI pay for things like its deal for Oracle to supply computing capacity.

content.title: What Oracle Has to Lose From OpenAI and Nvidia’s Rocky Relationship
content.summary: OpenAI’s relationship with Nvidia has epitomized concerns about circularity in artificial-intelligence deals.  The companies’ letter of intent, unveiled Sept. 22, called for Nvidia to invest as much as $100 billion in OpenAI over many years.  While some of the money would flow back to Nvidia for its chips, some would help OpenAI pay for things like its deal for Oracle to supply computing capacity.

headline: CoreWeave Faces Lawsuits As Nvidia Investment Reframes AI Infrastructure Story
summary: Multiple class action lawsuits have been filed against CoreWeave (NasdaqGS:CRWV) over allegations that the company misled investors about its AI infrastructure capacity and revenue guidance. In parallel, Nvidia has agreed to invest US$2b in CoreWeave and expand their operational partnership around AI data center infrastructure. The combination of legal actions and Nvidia’s capital commitment has put CoreWeave’s disclosures, growth plans, and partnership model under closer market...

content.title: CoreWeave Faces Lawsuits As Nvidia Investment Reframes AI Infrastructure Story
content.summary: Multiple class action lawsuits have been filed against CoreWeave (NasdaqGS:CRWV) over allegations that the company misled investors about its AI infrastructure capacity and revenue guidance. In parallel, Nvidia has agreed to invest US$2b in CoreWeave and expand their operational partnership around AI data center infrastructure. The combination of legal actions and Nvidia’s capital commitment has put CoreWeave’s disclosures, growth plans, and partnership model under closer market...

headline: TSMC Founder’s Return Highlights US Expansion And Valuation Debate
summary: Morris Chang, founder of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing, appeared publicly for the first time in over a year alongside Nvidia’s CEO. The meeting coincides with TSMC’s plans to commit $165b to US factories and new US Taiwan semiconductor investment agreements. US tariffs on certain Taiwanese goods are set to be reduced, affecting TSMC’s cross border manufacturing and supply chain position. For investors watching Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing (NYSE:TSM), this news comes with the...
